item.description:
$20 - A concert for probably us "older folks" Ha ha! I bought my ticket!

Eye of the Tiger, The Search is Over, High on You, I'm Always Here (Baywatch Theme), Can't Hold Back, and so many more. Yes it is Jimi Jamison at Maddy's Friday 11/19 he is the former lead singer of Survivor, Target, and Cobra - he is performing all of his... hits, plus songs from his newer solo albums with EC Rock 5. A night and show not to miss. 11/19 at Maddy's in Saugus Ma! Jimi Jamison at Maddy's Live in Concert Tickets on sale now by phone 781-941-0807 or at www.jimijamison.com under tour dates sponsored by Mike FM and FBS Venue Management . Join us 11/19 at Maddys for Jimi Jamison at Maddy's Live in Concert. Also FYI - Micky Ward legendary boxer and inspiration for the movie starring Mark Wahlberg the Fighter will be in the house. Purchase today selling out. Opening act BRITANNICA!

http://myemail.consta...
item.name: Jimi Jamison concert Singer of Eye of the Tiger, The Search is Over, etc. Saugus
